title: Swim and live
creator_credit: Syd Wood, Frank Killian and Movietone Productions
brief_description: Describes the progressive steps in learning to swim and how a life can be lost by not being able to swim. Illustrates different swimming styles and shows a championship swimming event. Features Olympic champion Murray Rose.
creator_credit_for_label: Syd Wood, Frank Killian and Movietone Productions
